name: Debabrata Pati
bio_html: Senior AI/ML professional with patented innovations commercialized into enterprise platforms. Guides teams from researchto operational AI/ML products, driving outcomes including a 14% sales uplift within 6 months via AI personalization, ~30%AML false positive reduction within two quarters, and 75% SAR generation time optimization.
contact_note: References & contacts will be furnished up on request.
profile_summary: Innovator & Data Analytics Proffesional| Lead Data Scientist at Aktana | Indian School of Business Alum | Multiple Patent Holder | Forever Student
experience_summary: Senior Data Scientist with extensive experience leading AI/ML R&D and deployment across global organizations including Aktana, NICE Actimize, and Cognizant. Currently leading advanced analytics and personalization initiatives in pharma omnichannel marketing, delivering double-digit sales uplift through propensity modeling, counterfactual analysis, journey optimization, and reinforcement learning. Architected scalable MLOps and model factory frameworks, cutting deployment timelines by 50%. Previously spearheaded AI-driven AML and financial crime detection systems, reducing false positives by ~30% and automating SAR generation to cut investigation time by 75%. Strong background in graph analytics, NLP, experimentation, and regulatory-grade AI solutions. Earlier career includes large-scale fraud detection, pricing optimization, and cloud/data-center migration analytics across BFS and enterprise domains. Recognized inventor with multiple international patents and award-winning contributions.
experience_highlights: Senior AI/ML Proffesional Driving Enterprise-Scale Intelligence
From Patents to Production: AI That Delivers Measurable Business Impact
